name: Double Tap (quavers)
description:
Double Tap is a fast and enraging game that will test you strategy, skill and patience.

=How To Play=

Colour in all of the platforms by touching them, however you can't touch platforms that are already coloured in. Your ability to wall jump and double jump will be useful. Finally, you can find collectables scattered around the levels, they DO NOT effect progression but they are fun for an extra challenge.

Good luck!

=Controls=

Movement - WASD

Jump - Space

Main Menu - E
